summary: A comprehensive suite of testing utilities for Django that supplies context managers, decorators, and mixins to temporarily alter application settings, script prefixes, app registries, and system checks; capture SQL queries, log output, and warnings; and provide assorted helpers for XML handling, time manipulation, and environment setup/teardown during test execution.
business_intent: To streamline the creation, execution, and maintenance of Django test cases by offering reusable tools that isolate test environments, modify configuration on the fly, and capture diagnostic information, thereby improving test reliability and developer productivity.
